Vampire.OverrideDescMsgID:
Absorbs a portion of the damage dealt to restore <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_HP|/> for itself & it's trainer. 
Does not sleep at night and continues to work.

SalePrice_Up_3.OverrideDescMsgID:
Increases the value of items when sold by +{EffectValue1}%
Decreases the purchase cost from shops by 5%.

Disciplined.OverrideDescMsgID:
Attack +{EffectValue2}%
Will not reduce the target's Health below 1.

Regenerative.OverrideDescMsgID: +{EffectValue1}% increase to the Player & Pal's HP regeneration rate

Leech.OverrideDescMsgID: Absorbs a portion of the damage dealt to restore <uiCommon id=|COMMON_STATUS_HP|/> for itself & it's trainer.

RockHound.OverrideDescMsgID:
{EffectValue1}% increase in Player Mining Efficiency.
{EffectValue2}% increase in Pal mining efficiency when assigned to a base.

Excavator.OverrideDescMsgID:
{EffectValue1}% increase in Player Mining Efficiency.
{EffectValue2}% increase in Pal mining efficiency when assigned to a base.

Lumberjack.OverrideDescMsgID:
{EffectValue1}% increase in Player Logging Efficiency.
{EffectValue2}% increase in Pal logging efficiency when assigned to a base.

Deforester.OverrideDescMsgID:
{EffectValue1}% increase in Player Logging Efficiency.
{EffectValue2}% increase in Pal logging efficiency when assigned to a base.

BrilliantTactician.OverrideDescMsgID:
{EffectValue1}% increase in Player Attack & Defense.
If assigned to a base, grants all Pals at that base +{EffectValue3}% Attack.

Hardy.OverrideDescMsgID:
+{EffectValue1}% Defense
 Pal's regeneration rate increased by +{EffectValue2}%

Resilient.OverrideDescMsgID:
+{EffectValue1}% Defense

Gardener.OverrideDescMsgID: When assigned to a base, increases the growth rate of crops by +{EffectValue1}%

GreenThumb.OverrideDescMsgID: When assigned to a base, increases the growth rate of crops by +{EffectValue1}%

Horticulturist.OverrideDescMsgID: When assigned to a base, increases the growth rate of crops by +{EffectValue1}%, & harvest yield by {EffectValue2}%

Acrobat.OverrideDescMsgID:
+{EffectValue1}% boost to Jump height.
{EffectValue2}% boost to Player Jump height.
Allows for an additional jump when riding this Pal.

Babysitter.OverrideDescMsgID: Increases Egg hatching speed when assigned to a base, by +<NumBlue_13>15%</>

ParentalInstincts.OverrideDescMsgID: Increases Egg hatching speed when assigned to a base, by <NumBlue_13>35%</>

Weatherproof.OverrideDescMsgID: If in the party, grants the trainer with +1 cold and heat resistance. (NON-FUNCTIONAL)

HeavyLifter.OverrideDescMsgID: Attack +{EffectValue2}%. Increases the player's carrying capacity by {EffectValue1}.

Strongman.OverrideDescMsgID: Attack +{EffectValue2}%. Increases the player's carrying capacity by {EffectValue1}.

BulgingBiceps.OverrideDescMsgID: Attack +{EffectValue2}%. Increases the player's carrying capacity by {EffectValue1}.

LightAsAFeather.OverrideDescMsgID: Increases the jump height of the Pal and Player by +{EffectValue1}%

Curious.OverrideDescMsgID: When assigned to a base, increases research speed there by {EffectValue1}%.

Scientist.OverrideDescMsgID: When assigned to a base, increases research speed there by {EffectValue1}%.

ExpeditionaryOrganizer.OverrideDescMsgID: When assigned to a base, increase reward rate of Expeditions by +<NumBlue_13>25%</>, while decreasing Expedition time by <NumBlue_13>3%</>.

Cloner.OverrideDescMsgID: When assigned to a base, increases item duplication chances from production by +{EffectValue1}%.

Cheap.OverrideDescMsgID: When assigned to a base, decreases item production cost by <NumBlue_13>3%</>.

PowerSaver.OverrideDescMsgID: When assigned to a base, decreases Power Consumption by <NumBlue_13>5%</>.
